firm_information.name: CENTURY 21 Myers Real Estate Co., Inc. Northwest

house_listing.house_location: 11141 Forest Hill Lane Corpus Christi, TEXAS 78410
house_listing.house_description: Oversized, tree-shaded lot with space for parking RV, boat, or trailer. A/C androof 5 yrs old. Foundation report by Du-West Inspection clear 6/99. Owner says1800 sf. Home warranty for buyer. Easy access to IH37. School bus stops atfront door. Prime Calallen neighborhood. Rear wrap garage, fenced backyard,fresh interior paint. One huge walk-through living/dining area.Conv, FHA, VA, cash, Texas VetOwner says 1800 sf.
